content:
/>
X.i.4.C.2.h
.
Handling Denial or Withdrawal of Service Recognition
When recognition of alleged service is denied or a prior recognition is withdrawn, then either
deny the claim, or
in the case of a running award, follow the due process procedures in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, 3.B.2
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section C - Development of Philippine Claims
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section C
